content.name: Emir Gökhan ÖZÇELİK
content.personal: 34 years old, Turkish, currently living in Toulouse, France, relocation possible to anywhere in the World
content.mission: Passionate about application design and development in all of its layers, I am looking for new career opportunities with a larger space to evolve and make a change for the better. I thrive with learning and problem-solving challenges in everyday life and aim to always be better than yesterday.

subdetails.noUserInputText: Charged with complete rethinking of the public reservation Web platform in Less, Vue.js, Node.js and Sequelize with TDD
Proposed, designed, developed and deployed several modules on an existing internal Web platform for database transfer and configuration in Twig, CSS, Vue.js, Php, and Mysql with TDD
Proposed and developed a proof-of-concept mobile app for public reservation platform in Flutter-Dart (I learned it for this project), MongoDB (with Firebase) and Node.js
Started the Turkish version of the official Vue.js Documentation Website.
Self-taught, designed, built and deployed a basic interactive Web app with several game modules for teaching vocabulary in Html, CSS, JQuery, Php and Mysql.
Self-taught, designed, built and deployed two basic Android apps, one for teaching phonetics and another one for teaching grammar.

degrees.title: Bachelor Degree in Software Application Development

subdetails.noUserInputText: Lectures and small projects in Javascript, Typescript, Angular 2, Agile Development and Application Design, MySQL, Php, CodeIgniter, Java SE, Java EE, Spring, Hibernate, Android and Node.js
Term Project: Design choices and best practices for an internal database transfer application.

degrees.title: Master's Degree in Linguistics and Translation

subdetails.noUserInputText: Term Project : Linguistic analysis and translation of 'Turcs et Grecs : Entre Eris et Eros au tournant du siècle', a socio-political research book about Turkish-Greek relations.

degrees.title: Bachelor Degree in French Literature - Hacettepe University, Turkey & Toulouse University - Mirail II, France
